tool_description: The YouTube Influencer Search API returns the most relevant influencers for your target keyword or domain.
name: YouTube Influencer Search
title: YouTube Influencer Search

api_list.name: getSearchResults
api_list.description: Get the results from a certain search id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-influencer-search.p.rapidapi.com/searches/5/results"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-influencer-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-influencer-search.p.rapidapi.com/searches/{id}/results"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-influencer-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
